attributes.action: ALL NURSES AND DOCTORS TO BE TESTED FOR CORONA VIRUS
attributes.additional_details: The government  should  be looking after the people who are putting there own safety to take care of people . They our on public transport as well not aware if they have the virus this can not be right act now
attributes.background: I have a sister and and my sons girlfriend work in nhs not been tested and this is not right as dealing with vulnerable patients .I think these people deserve better there putting there life’s on the line for all of us and they have family’s who are so worried about them please do this

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
